@MikaylaRailyn @ava_van_buren @JarrahNicole @JunoJones7 @princesezy @heyitskmatt have. and for this vaccine, it was the first time in the world that researchers made all their data on the virus and vaccine and studies and trials open data. meaning we could get the best and most accurate data to create the vaccine safely!

Weather radar data are useful for so many applications ranging from climate studies, to biological monitoring. With ASDI we are trying to help groups with radar data be able to share it more broadly https://t.co/KJbO732prN

@RajBhardwajMD @GregGinYYC When working on open data I heard someone say, "I don't want to release the data, it's only 60% accurate" and the response was, "if that's good enough for you to use to make a decision, it should be good enough for others too." Perfect is the enemy of the good.

... pero apenas los incluyeron. ¬øPara qu√© sirve este dato entonces? Es una aproximaci√≥n, a veces no muy buena, del ritmo de la epidemia. Lo ideal es acomodar los casos por fecha de inicio de s√≠ntomas de cada caso, y no por la fecha en que fueron incluidos en los datos abiertos...
